forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
